name: TortoiseSvn
help: TortoiseSVN is a free open-source Windows client for the Apache� Subversion� version control system.

tasks.help: Check out a working copy from a repository.

properties.name: Depth
properties.help: Instructs Subversion to limit the scope of an operation to a particular tree depth.

properties.name: IgnoreExternals
properties.help: Tells Subversion to ignore externals definitions and the external working copies managed by them.

properties.name: Revision
properties.help: Specifies a revision (or range of revisions) on with which to operate.

tasks.help: Exports a clean directory tree from the repository specified by, URL
